item.description:
After a hectic week - and to celebrate that your Organizer does NOT have to be back on the road at 5am Monday morning! - thought I'd post this spontaneous Sunday evening event.

The Alchemist Lounge is a great casual local pub/restaurant that has live music every night - including Sundays (and there's never a cover charge).

So - if you're in the mood for some comfort food & relaxing jazz - come down at 8pm for pub grub & a brew or two and some entertaining company & conversation (well, we at least aim to be entertaining!).

Not planning to make it a very late night - but if you get the yen to stay longer, the bar is open until 1am on a Sunday.... :)
More info on the band
item.how_to_find_us: At the bar!!! On the left as you come in the front door.
item.name: Sunday wind-down - a little light music & yummy pub grub
